```{r}
diamondPrices <- "Data/DiamondPrices.csv"
data <- read.csv(diamondPrices, header=TRUE)

data$cut <- factor(data$cut)
data$color <- factor(data$color)
data$clarity <- factor(data$clarity)

str(data)
```
```{r}
set.seed(1234)
i <- sample(1:nrow(data), nrow(data)*.80)

train <- data[i,]
test <- data[-i,]
```
```{r}
lm1 <- lm(data$price~data$carat, data=train)
pred <- predict(lm1, newdata=test)
#cor1 <- cor(pred, test$price)
```

```{r}
data("ChickWeight")
set.seed(1234)
i <- sample(1:nrow(ChickWeight), nrow(ChickWeight)*0.75, replace=FALSE)
train <- ChickWeight[i,]
test <- ChickWeight[-i,]
lm1 <- lm(weight~Time, data=train)
summary(lm1)
pred1 <- predict(lm1, newdata=test)
cor1 <- cor(pred1, test$weight)
```
